text: Advanced Micro Devices, Inc. (NASDAQ:AMD ) Q1 2024 Earnings Conference Call April 30, 2024 5:00 PM ET Company Participants Mitch Haws - Vice President, Investor Relations Lisa Su - Chair and Chief Executive Officer Jean Hu - Executive Vice President, Chief Financial Officer and Treasurer Conference Call Participants Toshiya Hari - Goldman Sachs Ross Seymore - Deutsche Bank Matt Ramsey - TD Cowen Aaron Rakers - Wells Fargo Vivek Arya - Bank of America Securities Timothy Arcuri - UBS Joe Moore - Morgan Stanley Stacy Rasgon - Bernstein Research Harlan Sur - JPMorgan Tom O'Malley - Barclays Harsh Kumar - Piper Sandler Operator Greetings and welcome to the AMD First Quarter 2024 Conference Call. At this time, all participants are in a listen-only mode.
